Instance.description: A tuning structure that specifies all the needed data to create a club.

TunableVariant.name: associated_color
TunableVariant.description: The color tag associated with this Club.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The color tag associated with this Club.

TunableVariant.name: associated_style
TunableVariant.description: If Enabled allows tuning the Style of the club outfit. You'll need to use an appropriate style Tag since Tag includes lots of different things. An exmaple would be Style_Boho or Style_Country. The club_outfit_setting does not need to be set to STYLE in order to tune this. If this is tuned and the club_outfit_setting is not set to STYLE this will still show up as the default Style choice for the club in the UI.

TunableEnum.name: enabled
TunableEnum.description: The tag representation of the desired style. For instance Style_Country.

TunableEnum.name: club_outfit_setting
TunableEnum.description: The Club Outfit Setting that the group is set to when it is created. This needs to be set properly so that when a player starts a gathering the Sims will spin into the appropriate outfit. For example if you want to create a pre-seeded club that has an outfit that is setup in Club CAS then this should be set to OVERRIDE. If instead that group is supposed to use the clubs colors then set this to COLOR.

TunableList.name: club_rules
TunableList.description: A set of rules that all club members must adhere to.

TunableVariant.description: This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a Clubrule tuning snippet.

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A tuning structure that defines a single club rule.

Tunable.name: action
Tunable.description: The ClubInteractionGroup that this rule applies to.

TunableVariant.name: restriction
TunableVariant.description: Whether this rule encourages or discourages its action.

TunableVariant.name: with_whom
TunableVariant.description: If specified, this rule will only apply to cases where the actions set in '1_action' are targeting a Sim that matches these criteria.

TunableVariant.name: enabled
TunableVariant.description: If specified, this rule will only apply to cases where the actions set in '1_action' are targeting a Sim that matches these criteria.

TunableList.name: ages
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must be one of the specified ages.

TunableList.name: careers
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must have one of these Careers.

TunableList.name: required_club_seeds
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must be a member of one the specified Clubs.

TunableList.name: fame_rank_requirements
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the Sim must have a fame rank that has been selected.

TunableEnum.name: household_value
TunableEnum.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target sim must have a household value in this enum value's associated interval.

TunableEnum.name: marital_status
TunableEnum.description: Marital status a Sim must have in order to pass this criteria.

TunableList.name: skills
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must have one of these skills with a skill level of at least the value specified in MINIMUM_CRITERIA_SKILL_LEVEL.

TunableList.name: traits
TunableList.description: In order to pass this criteria, the target Sim must have one of these Traits.

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a Clubrule tuning snippet.

TunableVariant.name: hangout
TunableVariant.description: Specify where this Club regularly hangs out.

TunableTuple.name: lot
TunableTuple.description: The Club hangout is a specific lot.

TunableTuple.name: venue
TunableTuple.description: The Club hangout is a specific venue. The Club will regularly hang out at any lot matching the specified venue.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableTuple.name: initial_number_of_memebers
TunableTuple.description: An interval specifying the maximum and minimum initial number of members, including the Club leader, this club will be created with. Maximum number of initial members corresponds to the maximum number of members allowed in a club.

Tunable.name: lower_bound

Tunable.name: invite_only
Tunable.description: If checked, this Club is invite-only and Sims cannot join unless they're invited to. If unchecked, Sims can join this Club without being asked.
